alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 7:50PM CST until February 20 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas...Missouri... Saint Francis River near Saint Francis For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis, Lake City, Madison...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Francis River near Saint Francis. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Several roads near Wilhelmina, Missouri are flooded. Recreational areas and large areas of agricultural land near the river are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 20.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 22.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.4 feet on 01/14/2005. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
